data.name: neXus
data.detailed_description:
The new creation, the neXus. The center of the universe. With its creation comes many different areas to explore. Use your weapons to help Vrenthur make the world safe.

THE NEXUS


With the creation of the neXus, so many possibilities have come into play. With every new portal that is introduced, comes a new adventure, items, creatures, and so much more.

DIFFERENT WORLDS


Every portal in the neXus leads to a different world. Whether it leads to a city, a forest, and snowy mountain, or a dungeon, they remain different.

CUSTOMIZATION AND ITEMS


Unlock many different skins for your character, weapons, ship, and hoverbike. These skins can be found by completing missions or exploring the open worlds within the neXus.

Weapons


With a wide assortment of different weapons being introduced and added, you can use them to protect yourself or others while defeating your enemies. Find weapons over the world or by completing missions.

data.short_description: The new creation, the neXus. The center of the universe. With its creation comes many different areas to explore. Use your weapons to help Vrenthur make the world safe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 2GB / AMD R9 280 better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is highly recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 / AMD R9 Fury
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is highly recommended.
